Row.Text: TO EARN A NEW AGE NEXT ERA:
Era Score requirements have been reduced
Era Score requirements have been increased
Era Progress[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]View current Era Score and Dedications.
You have accomplished much, great leader! Which of your triumphs shall our scribes commit to history?
You are in a Heroic Age!
You are in a Golden Age!
You are in a Dark Age!
You are in a Normal Age.
{LOC_ERA_TT_HAVE_HEROIC_AGE_EFFECT}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You may make 3 Dedications, each of which will provide a powerful gameplay bonus during the Age.
{LOC_ERA_TT_HAVE_GOLDEN_AGE_EFFECT}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You may make a Dedication, which will provide a powerful gameplay bonus during the Age.
{LOC_ERA_TT_HAVE_DARK_AGE_EFFECT}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You may make a Dedication, which will provide an additional source of Era Score during the Age.
{LOC_ERA_TT_HAVE_NORMAL_AGE_EFFECT}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You may make a Dedication, which will provide an additional source of Era Score during the Age.

You are in a [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE] Heroic Age during this game era![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each of your [ICON_Citizen] Citizens exerts 1.5 Loyalty pressure in their city. This pressure also affects other cities within 9 tiles, but is 10% less effective per tile. It will be easier to maintain Loyalty in your cities, and challenge the Loyalty of nearby foreign cities.

You are in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age during this game era![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each of your [ICON_Citizen] Citizens exerts 1.5 Loyalty pressure in their city. This pressure also affects other cities within 9 tiles, but is 10% less effective per tile. It will be easier to maintain Loyalty in your cities, and challenge the Loyalty of nearby foreign cities.

You are in a [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] Dark Age during this game era.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each of your [ICON_Citizen] Citizens exerts 0.5 Loyalty pressure in their city. This pressure also affects other cities within 9 tiles, but is 10% less effective per tile. It will be harder to maintain Loyalty in your cities, and more difficult to affect the Loyalty of nearby foreign cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You may adopt powerful Dark Policies in your Government, but which may carry a heavy price.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you are not in the last Era, and earn enough Era Score for a Golden Age in the next game era, you will instead earn a Heroic Age, able to make multiple Dedications for multiple powerful bonuses.

You are in a [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Normal Age during this game era.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each of your [ICON_Citizen] Citizens exerts the normal amount of 1 Loyalty pressure in their city. This pressure also affects other cities within 9 tiles, but is 10% less effective per tile.
Dedication Bonus: Cities converted to your religion (+{1_ScoreIncrement} per conversion)
Dedication Bonus: Trade Routes completed (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: New landmarks discovered (+{1_ContinentScoreIncrement} for Continents, +{2_NaturalWonderScoreIncrement} for Natural Wonders)
Dedication Bonus: Non-Barbarian naval Units killed (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Buildings constructed that provides Science as a base yield. (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Buildings with a Great Work slot constructed (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Buildings constructed from the Aerodrome district (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Industrial or later building constructed (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Each successful offensive Spy operation (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Each extracted artifact (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Dedication Bonus: Each Great Person earned (+{1_ScoreIncrement} each)
Cities when Era began ({1_ScoreIncrement} per city)
Golden Ages ever earned ({1_ScoreIncrement} per Age)
Dark Ages ever earned ({1_ScoreIncrement} per Age)
Government Anarchy this Era ({1_ScoreIncrement} per Anarchy)
[NEWLINE]Threshold to earn a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age next era: {1_thresh} or above
[NEWLINE]Threshold to avoid a [ICON_GLORY_DARK_AGE] Dark Age next era: {1_thresh} or above
Your civilization prospered last era, leading them into a Golden Age for this era!
Your civilization faltered last era, bringing about a Dark Age for this era.
Golden Ages are earned by triggering Historic Moments, and provide powerful bonuses.[NEWLINE]These players have earned a Golden Age for this era:

Dark Ages are possible beginning in the Medieval era and pose challenges to large or underdeveloped civilizations. -1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and -50% Growth in all cities. If a player gets a Dark Age again in the next era, half of their cities will fall into ruin and become barbarian camps.[NEWLINE]These players have entered a Dark Age for this era:
Because you earned a Heroic Age, you may make three Dedications.
Because you earned a Golden Age, you may make one Dedication.
Because you earned a Dark Age, you may make one Dedication.
Because you earned a Normal Age, you may make one Dedication.
You will earn a {1_AgeName} next Era
